▪ “Communication” and “Employee Retention” 4.3 3.5 4.0 4.2 4.3 3.7 3.4 ▪ The 2007 DOR Employee Satisfaction Survey underwent significant revision, including the incorporation of the DOP Climate Survey questions. ▪ The 2007 DOR ESS results will be shared electronically and discussed in employee feedback sessions throughout the Department. Priorities and action plans will be charted at the agency and divisional levels. ▪ Employee involvement is addressed through the Strategic Business Plan Initiative, Agency Communication. This quality team recommended two strategies to improve key communication processes: Provide Communication Training & Guidelines and Update the Content of Intranet Pages. ▪ The resulting priorities from the 2007 DOR ESS process will provide a basis for developing a Strategic Business Plan initiative in the next planning cycle. ▪ “Communication” and “Employee Retention”
